front.title: PMIPv6 Multihoming Extension and Synchronization in LMA and MAG

abstract.t: Proxy Mobile IPv6 is standardized to provide network-based mobility management for a regular IPv6 mobile node. This document introduces an extension to Proxy Mobile IPv6 for multihoming MN. Through extending the binding relationship between HNP and MAG in BCE, and synchronizing this information between LMA and MAGs, LMA can deliver data having the same HNP through multiple MAGs. Thus the MN attaching in a PMIPv6 domain can receive data packets with the same destination through its multiple network interfaces attaching to different MAGs simultaneously.
